8000 <-> 1000000000000000 #0 <-> 000000
8014 <-> 1000000000010100 #1 <-> 000100
C350 <-> 1100001101010000 #2 <-> 001000
C3B4 <-> 1100001110110100 #3 <-> 001100
C3BF <-> 1100001110111111 #4 <-> 010000
d903 <-> 1101100100000011 #5 <-> 010100
8235 <-> 1000001000110101 #6 <-> 011000
8000 <-> 1000000000000000 #7 <-> 011100
